Indiana University of Pennsylvania Ambassadors donates thousands of dollars each year to fund university causes like student scholarships and library books and technology PERIOD

Ambassadors typically donates between  and  annually depending on their fundraising outcomes PERIOD

This is a part of the approximately  million that the IUP Development Officers collect annually for all departments according to Bill Speidel vice president for university advancement PERIOD

The mission of the IUP Ambassadors is to link current students prospective students alumni administration faculty staff and the university and local communities PERIOD

The Ambassadors were established in  and work directly with the Office of Alumni Relations and the IUP Alumni Association PERIOD

Ambassadors also works with the IUP Development Officers to find various initiatives that could use funding especially those who will influence as many students as possible PERIOD

Some of these initiatives included financing scholarships making classrooms in the Kovalchick Convention and Athletic Complex and McElhaney Hall assigning a technology resource room in Stephenson Hall putting technology at the outdoor science center behind Stouffer Hall and contributing to the library and Arboretum funds PERIOD

This year we still do not know yet how much money we will raise as we are in the thick of our main fundraiser the Tuition Raffle Program Ambassadors adviser and assistant director of alumni relations Sara Lawer said PERIOD

Ambassadors main fundraiser this year is its annual Tuition Raffle Program that runs from the start of school and concludes at the last home football game of the regular season when the winners are announced PERIOD

For the program the Ambassadors stuff label and mail letters to all the families of the undergraduate students at IUP PERIOD

Families can purchase tickets by mailing the letters back to the Ambassadors office PERIOD One ticket is  and three tickets are  PERIOD

The grand prize is a semester of instate tuition and the runnerup wins a  CoOp store gift card PERIOD

The program has been very successful according to Lawer PERIOD

We have awarded  semesters of instate tuition and thousands of dollars in book scholarships since the programs inception in  Lawer said PERIOD

Many of the ambassador programs at other Pennsylvania State System of Higher Education schools engage in similar activities but with much less fundraising for the university PERIOD

Stephanie Swanger with Shippensburg Universitys Alumni Relations office said that their ambassadors program does very little fundraising except for the program itself PERIOD

They only raise money if they need it which is about  annually Swanger said PERIOD

Ambassors are here to support activities on campus such as the presidents activities or sporting events. east Stroudsburg Universitys ambassador program Warrior Elite is similarly run PERIOD

We strive to encourage positive interaction among students alumni and guests of the university as well as to foster a sense of pride and school spirit director of alumni engagement Brooke Donovan said PERIOD

Lawer said the IUP Ambassadors use fundraising as an educational tool to get students out there and teach them philanthropy PERIOD

We want them to see the impact of giving to IUP and that it is as good as giving to other organizations such as the United Way Lawer said PERIOD We want to teach them about giving early and supporting the alma matter. the IUP Ambassadors have won numerous awards both on the district and international levels from Council for Advancement and Support of Education Affiliated Student Advancement Programs PERIOD

The Ambassadors were recently recognized by the Council of Trustees with a Resolution of Appreciation for  years of volunteer service to IUP PERIOD
